column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: A 27-kg female python was caught in Choam Chao 2 commune
column4: Pursat Chey district at 8:30 pm on March 4
column6: said the snake was spotted in an area near the village where there are still rice fields and ponds. ------However
column8: it will be sent to live in a safer place more suitable for wildlife.------According to  Ouy Sam Oeun
column10: the serpent was over  3 meters in length and weighs 27 kilograms. It was found by local people when it was pulled out of the field
column11: but the village chief took it to safety to avoid it falling into the hands of wildlife traders.
